author: Special Correspondent
text:
Three days after the hit and run case in which a 21-year-old Air Force personnel lost his life, the Kolkata Police on Saturday said that it was not 26-year-old Ambia Sohrab, elder son of former RJD MLA Mohd Sohrab, but his younger brother Sambia was at the wheels when the accident occurred.

“It is more or less confirmed [that] Sambia was driving the car,” Debasish Boral Special Additional Commissioner of Kolkata Police (Crime) told journalists.

This comes as a fresh revelation in the case as earlier it was believed that Mr. Ambia was driving the vehicle on Wednesday morning.
title: Hit and run case: ‘younger brother was driving car’
